title: Bug 5340: Cancelling add exception breakpoint has no effect
OB: When trying to cancel the process of adding an exception breakpoint, the progress dialog immediately closes. However, the exception list still appears, indicating that the cancellation request was ignored. The cancel button should either be disabled or the cancellation request should be honored. To achieve this, when calling ProgressMonitorDialog.run, make sure to pass false for the 'cancellable' parameter.
